physical_appearance:\The image shows two strips of palm leaf and a stamped envelope. All of them are light brown in colour. There is a thread running through the circular holes located on the left hand side of each strip of palm leaf. There are Tamil scripts written
 in straight horizontal lines from left to right
 as well as in several handwritten boxes. \\Pno. No 16440\\ and \\S.T.S. Rm. Ramasamy Chettiar\\ are written in black ink at theleft hand side of the palm leaves. \\Empire of India
subject_terms_1:Life Assurance Company Ltd Madras Branch Hinduism inscriptions envelopes
subject_terms_2:First Line Beach\\ is stamped on the left hand and right hand side of the envelope. There are four stamps pasted side by side on the envelope Hindu astrology Palm-leaf inscriptions Stamped envelopes
subject_terms_3:and all of them indicate \\India postage\\.\
subject_terms_4:astrology
context_1:Horoscopes
context_2:Hinduism

metadata.title_text: Ramasamy Chettiar, Palm Leaf and an envelope Horoscope of Ramasamy Chettiar, Palm Leaf
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows two strips of palm leaf and a stamped envelope. All of them are light brown in colour. There is a thread running through the circular holes located on the left hand side of each strip of palm leaf. There are Tamil scripts written, in straight horizontal lines from left to right, as well as in several handwritten boxes. ""Pno. No 16440"" and ""S.T.S. Rm. Ramasamy Chettiar"" are written in black ink at theleft hand side of the palm leaves. ""Empire of India
metadata.subject_terms_1: Life Assurance Company Ltd Madras Branch Hinduism inscriptions envelopes
metadata.subject_terms_2: First Line Beach"" is stamped on the left hand and right hand side of the envelope. There are four stamps pasted side by side on the envelope Hindu astrology Palm-leaf inscriptions Stamped envelopes
metadata.subject_terms_3: and all of them indicate ""India postage""."
